body_html: Oh, I see. In your case, if you want to generate a tensor of a specific type from torch.zeros, you could use something like tensor = torch.zeros(4, 4, out=torch.DoubleTensor()), but this is a bit ugly.
body_text: Oh, I see. In your case, if you want to generate a tensor of a specific type from torch.zeros, you could use something like tensor = torch.zeros(4, 4, out=torch.DoubleTensor()), but this is a bit ugly.
body: Oh, I see. In your case, if you want to generate a tensor of a specific type from `torch.zeros`, you could use something like `tensor = torch.zeros(4, 4, out=torch.DoubleTensor())`, but this is a bit ugly.
